name: Heartbeat
description:
#02 from the series: Boiling Ideas

Heartbeat

13 hand drawn frames
Dimensions: 1000x1000p
File type: .gif
Files size: 5,94 MB (6.233.934 bytes)
El Cocones, 2021.

~

[Note #02: Use your colors wisely, they can carry meaning, and can be used to intensify the idea you want to emphasize in your work. This piece was previously in black and white with no title, but at the moment I changed the color to red, the vibrations of the work gained a new scope of meaning, which gave its title: Heartbeat.]

~

Boiling Ideas is a series of visual compositions accompanied by notes. The concept of this collection is to share insights about art/image/history, and express them visually, while keeping the process experimental, and fun.

I embrace the instability of my hand to fell more present in my works, and turn mistakes into a creative process frame by frame (see: Boil Line Animation). My goal is to share the best pieces of knowledge that I’ve acquired studying during my life.
